sd1.description: Standard deviation of the major axis in the Poincaré Plot.

sd2.description: Standard deviation of the minor axis in the Poincaré Plot.

poincarea.description: Area of the Poincaré Plot fitted ellipse.

sample_entropy.description: Sample entropy of the NNI series.

dfa_alpha1.description: Alpha value of the short term Detrended Fluctuation Analysis of an NNI series.

dfa_alpha2.description: Alpha value of the long term Detrended Fluctuation Analysis of an NNI series.

tinn_n.description: N value of the TINN computation.

tinn_m.description: M value of the TINN computation.

tinn.description: Baseline width of the NNI histogram based on the triangular Interpolation (TINN).

triangular_index.description: Ratio between the total number of NNIs and the maximum of the NNI histogram distribution.
